properties.name: Integration type
properties.description:
Enter the Module integration types for test. supported types are - jiracloud
Note : Remove type which you don't want to test.

Enable Module Integration and use in the WF targets 
1. Import the WF which has the Module integration targets and Verify Error Message when Integrations targets are no enabled
2. Enable the below Integration
    a. Jira Cloud
    b. Service Now
3. Create New Workflow with HTTP actions and Map all above targets in Action Level 
4. Updated the Module Integration targets to imported wf which is in Invalid state and also add upper case action and map the target variable reference in int (action level)
5. Run the wf and Verify the action status  
6. Remove the Integration Modules and Targets
